parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Valid values: any non-zero positive integer. Default value: 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values:

*   30 (default)
*   50
*   100

parameters.name: TargetMajorVersion
parameters.description: The new major engine version of the instance. The new major engine version must be later than the original major engine version.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the upgrade check task. You can obtain the ID of the upgrade check task from the **TaskId** parameter in the response to the UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersionPrecheck operation.
